start_offset.description: Offset from root to climb point/ledge at the time we attach to it

climb_offset.description: Offset from root to climb point/ledge at the time we reach hanging

max_height.description: Max height of an obstacle to be able to perform a climb (from gound and from air)

max_forward_distance.description: Max forward distance (from gound and from air)

forward_start_check_distance_per_ms.description: Distance forward per m/s movement speed to add to the minimum check distance

max_auto_step_up_height.description: Indicates the maximun height with which we can trigger an auto step up climb.

auto_step_up_cd.description: Indicates how much cooldown between auto step ups triggers we should have.
